title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A creamy, comforting Italian pasta dish with pancetta, egg, and Parmesan.
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan and pepper.
Drain pasta and quickly toss with pancetta.
Stir in egg mixture off heat to create a creamy sauce.
Serve with extra Parmesan on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender chicken simmered in a rich, spiced tomato cream sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-sear chicken until browned.
Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until soft.
Add tomato puree and simmer with spices.
Stir in cream, then add chicken and cook until tender.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

title: Blueberry Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes bursting with fresh blueberries.
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk milk, egg, and melted butter together.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Fold in blueberries.
Cook on a greased skillet until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve warm with maple syrup.

title: Greek Salad
description: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, feta, and olives.
instructions: Chop cucumber, tomatoes, onion, and bell pepper.
Add olives and crumbled feta.
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, and salt.
Pour dressing over vegetables and toss gently.
Serve chilled.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Crispy tacos filled with seasoned ground beef and toppings.
instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned.
Stir in taco seasoning and a splash of water.
Spoon beef into taco shells.
Top with lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.
Serve immediately.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A quick and colorful stir-fry with fresh vegetables and soy sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add broccoli, carrot, and bell pepper.
Stir-fry until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and sesame oil, toss to coat.
Serve over rice or noodles.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out pizza dough onto a baking sheet.
Spread tomato sauce evenly.
Top with mozzarella slices and basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Bake until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

title: French Onion Soup
description: Rich caramelized onion soup topped with bread and melted cheese.
instructions: Caramelize onions in butter until golden brown.
Add broth, thyme, and sherry; simmer for 20 minutes.
Ladle soup into oven-safe bowls.
Top with bread slices and Gruyère cheese.
Broil until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve hot.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Chewy, golden-brown cookies packed with chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream butter and sugar until fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla, mix well.
Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Scoop dough onto baking sheet and bake 10-12 minutes.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with creamy Caesar dressing and croutons.
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add Parmesan cheese and croutons.
Top with grilled chicken if desired.
Serve immediately.
